title: PM condoles demise of senior journalist Khawaja Farrukh Saeed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif expressed grief and sorrow over the sad demise of senior journalist Khawaja Farrukh Saeed.
In a message of condolence here on Sunday, he said Khawaja Farrukh was a prominent leader of journalists of Pakistan, particularly of Punjab.
The PM said all his life he did journalism based on values and traditions and was known for his ideological writings.
The services of Khawaja Farrukh for journalism and journalists would be remembered for a long time to come, he added.He prayed to Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
